summary: A mysterious object crashes near the great valley, and Petrie's untrustful uncle arrives in search of it, believing it to be "a storm of cold fire", a susposed rock of great powers.
cast: Jeff Bennett|Anndi McAfee|Thomas Dekker|Aria Noelle Curzon|Rob Paulsen|Kenneth Mars|Miriam Flynn|John Ingle|Tress MacNeille|Jim Cummings|Charles Kimbrough|Patti Deutsch|Zoë Gulliksen|Michael York|Patrick Pinney
title: En busca del valle encantado 7: La misteriosa Piedra de Fuego
